content: Greetings! We're updating some vulnerabilities and are anxious for the fix in https://github.com/FHIR/sushi/pull/917. When is a 2.0.2 release of Sushi expected?
We have a few open PRs in flight right now. I think that once we get those merged, we can cut a release. That would probably be late this week. Would that work OK for you?
SUSHI 2.1.0 is now released, and includes the changes in 917!
